parameters.content:
## CORREÇÃO DE IA ANNA V2 COM WAHA API: PARA PAUSAR IA QUANDO REMETENTE ENVIA MENSAGEM DO CELULAR OU WHATSAPP WEB 
**INSTRUÇÔES:** 
**1 - Configure o node Postgress Trigger (Mensagem criada) com as credenciais do banco do Chatwoot** 
**1 - Configure o node Info base 1 com os dados do seu Chatwoot e ANNA TOOLS**

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "account": {
    "id": {{ $json.last_non_activity_message.account_id }},
    "name": "Domuss"
  },
  "content_type": "{{ $json.last_non_activity_message.content_type }}",
  "content": "{{ $json.last_non_activity_message.content }}",
  "conversation": {
    "can_reply": true,
    "channel": "{{ $json.meta.channel }}",
    "contact_inbox": {
      "id": 90,
      "contact_id": {{ $json.meta.sender.id }},
      "inbox_id": 2,
      "source_id": "{{ $json.last_non_activity_message.conversation.contact_inbox.source_id }}",
      "created_at": "2025-09-26T21:45:04.703Z",
      "updated_at": "2025-09-26T21:45:04.703Z",
      "hmac_verified": false,
      "pubsub_token": "RsGghyxyL18RahwdkRVfh3Te"
    },
    "id": {{ $json.last_non_activity_message.conversation_id }},
    "inbox_id": {{ $json.messages[0].inbox_id }},
    "messages": [
      {
        "id": {{ $json.messages[0].id }},
        "content": "{{ $json.messages[0].content }}",
        "account_id": {{ $json.messages[0].account_id }},
        "inbox_id": {{ $json.messages[0].inbox_id }},
        "conversation_id": {{ $json.messages[0].conversation_id }},
        "message_type": {{ $json.messages[0].message_type }},
        "created_at": "2025-09-26T21:45:04.703Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-09-26T21:45:04.703Z",
        "private": false,
        "status": "sent",
        "source_id": null,
        "content_type": "text",
        "sender_type": "User",
        "sender_id": null,
        "processed_message_content": "{{ $json.messages[0].processed_message_content }}",
        "conversation": {
          "assignee_id":{{ $json.messages[0].conversation.assignee_id }},
          "unread_count":{{ $json.messages[0].conversation.unread_count }},
          "last_activity_at": "2025-09-26T21:45:04.703Z",
          "contact_inbox": {
            "source_id": "{{ $json.messages[0].conversation.contact_inbox.source_id }}"
          }
        },
        "sender": {
          "id": {{ $json.last_non_activity_message.sender.id }},
          "name": "{{ $json.last_non_activity_message.sender.name }}",
          "available_name": "{{ $json.last_non_activity_message.sender.available_name }}",
          "avatar_url": "",
          "type": "User",
          "availability_status": "{{ $json.last_non_activity_message.sender.availability_status }}",
          "thumbnail": ""
        }
      }
    ],
"labels": {{ $json.labels2 }},
    "meta": {
      "sender": {
        "custom_attributes": {
          "status": "novo-lead"
        },
        "id": {{ $json.meta.sender.id }},
        "identifier": "{{ $json.meta.sender.identifier }}",
        "name": "{{ $json.meta.sender.name }}",
        "phone_number": "{{ $json.meta.sender.phone_number }}",
        "thumbnail": "{{ $json.meta.sender.thumbnail }}",
        "type": "contact"
      },
      "assignee": {
        "id": {{ $json.meta.assignee.id }},
        "name": "{{ $json.meta.assignee.name }}",
        "available_name": "{{ $json.meta.assignee.available_name }}",
        "type": "user",
        "availability_status": "{{ $json.meta.assignee.availability_status }}"
      },
      "hmac_verified": {{ $json.meta.hmac_verified }}
    },
    "status": "open",
    "unread_count": 0,
    "last_activity_at": "2025-09-26T21:45:04.703Z",
    "created_at": "2025-09-26T21:45:04.703Z"
  },
  "created_at": "2025-09-26T21:45:04.703Z",
  "id": {{ $json.messages[0].id }},
  "inbox": {
    "id": {{ $json.messages[0].inbox_id }},
    "name": ""
  },
  "message_type": "outgoing",
  "status": "sent",
  "private": false,
  "sender": {
    "id": {{ $json.last_non_activity_message.sender.id }},
    "name": "{{ $json.last_non_activity_message.sender.name }}",
    "email": "",
    "type": "user"
  },
  "source_id": null,
  "event": "message_created"
